div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid thim-bg-overlay vc_custom_1471016167480 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving

div.p: We envision a community where every student and every family will have the opportunity to succeed and thrive.
Central Lake Public Schools exists to educate students, strengthen families, and enrich our community.

div.address:
8169 W State Street
PO Box 128
Central Lake, MI 49622
div.p:
Business Office (231) 544-3141
High School Office (231) 544-3141 ext 200
Elementary Office (231) 544-3141 ext 300
School Fax (231) 544-2903

img.alt: OK2SAY - Stop the Silence. Help End the Violence
